DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety SPD417 give psychotropic medication treat bipolar I disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Safety SPD417 Combined With Other Psychotropic Medications Treatment Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: DSMIV criterion Bipolar I disorder Screening YMRS score = > 16 Women childbearing potential agree take adequate precaution contraception Currently receive treatment antipsychotic therapy combination therapy mood stabilizer antipsychotic Hospitalization require treatment psychiatric symptom Patients meet DSMIV ultrarapid cycle History serious suicide attempt require medical intervention Female subject pregnant lactating , include female positive pregnancy test screening
